item.title: How can i
item.dc:creator: @Unknown_Mop Unknown Mop
item.description:
@Unknown_Mop wrote:

Go into Player.java hit ctrl F and search for:

	[code]for (int lvl = 1;[/code]

You should find something similar to:

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 200; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0)); output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) return lvl; } return 200; }^

In this code the max skill level on my server is 200 to change that I must change all the 200â€™s to the skill level I want.

Step 3: once done with play.java open client.java and SEARCH FOR THE SAME THING, AND DO EXACTLY THE SAME THING YOU DID IN PLAYER.JAVA

Read full topic
